overview:
Patrick is an entrepreneur, with a background in online technology, ideas, strategy, user experience, product development, productivity tools & startup management.

As the Co-founder and CEO of Fusion Monarch Patrick is the fuel that drives Rule, team collaboration software. Patrick is passionate about and responsible for workflow management, product management, marketing and cultivating passionate geeks & creatives that produce ten times more than the average bloke.

Patrick received his BA in Business Administration with an emphasis in Online Technology from Cal State San Marcos. After graduating he worked with various entrepreneurs in fields ranging from advertising substrates to merchant banking and film finance prior entering the online space by combining his entrepreneurial ideas with his eduction in online technology. Having successfully lead the account generation, strategy, design, development and launch of DatingDNA (his second startup client experience), Patrick decided to specialize online startup management… in other words he fell in love with the startup process – ideas, strategy, production, team dynamics and of course results.

Patrick believes:

It’s not what you know that defines you, but how you master that which is unknown.
